name: AssemblyFromSurface
description: Creates Beams and joint rules from a planar brep.

inputParameters.name: plate
inputParameters.description: Tuple of two floats that determine width and height of plate elements in AssemblyFromSurface.

inputParameters.name: edge_stud
inputParameters.description: Tuple of two floats that determine width and height of edge_stud elements in AssemblyFromSurface.

inputParameters.name: king_stud
inputParameters.description: Tuple of two floats that determine width and height of king_stud elements in AssemblyFromSurface.

inputParameters.name: jack_stud
inputParameters.description: Tuple of two floats that determine width and height of jack_stud elements in AssemblyFromSurface.

inputParameters.name: stud
inputParameters.description: Tuple of two floats that determine width and height of stud elements in AssemblyFromSurface.

inputParameters.name: sill
inputParameters.description: Tuple of two floats that determine width and height of sill elements in AssemblyFromSurface.

inputParameters.name: header
inputParameters.description: Tuple of two floats that determine width and height of header elements in AssemblyFromSurface.
